attributes.action: Scrap quarantine for not vaccinated, pre-departure tests, vaccine segregation.
attributes.additional_details: You cannot treat people differently based on their vaccine status. People should not feel discriminated. We have the right to assess the risk ourselves. As proven vaccinated people can spread it too, so why they don't have to do pre- dep test and unvaccinated people do.We don't want to be punished for our choices. Vaccine passports do not prevent spreading the virus. Many studies proved that vaccinated people have the same viral load as unvaccinated so based on that they should not be segregated
attributes.background: I want Government to treat unvaccinated people the same as vaccinated. This includes restrictions on travel or entering clubs. No restrictions whatsoever. We want to be treated the same as people that have been vaccinated as having vaccine doesn't stop them from spreading or catching as proven.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop discriminating against the unvaccinated in Covid 19 policy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597239

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
